tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Finished T73 at the Lima, Peru Q-School to miss on his try to earn PGA TOUR Latinoamérica status… Made the cut in two of three starts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica in Mexico. Best finish was T33 at the 57th Abierto Mexicano in May… Carded a bogey-free 7-under 64 on the final round of the Developmental Series Final in Ecuador for a comfortable solo second finish that secured exempt status on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica in 2016… Had six top-10s in 9 starts on the Mexico Golf Tour, where his best finish was T3 at the Mazatlán Golf Championship.

2014: Finished T44 at the Lima, Peru Q-School to earn PGA TOUR Latinoamérica status in January… A T11 at the Lexus Panama Classic in May was his lone top-25 on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica. Made the cut in 4 of 12 starts to finish 118th on the Order of Merit… Missed the cut at the Web.com Tour's Mexico Championship in April.

2013: Missed on his try to earn PGA TOUR Latinoamérica status with a T43 finish at the Lima, Peru Q-School in February… Only cut made in three PGA TOUR Latinoamérica starts was T56 at the Arturo Calle Colombian Classic in November… Missed the cut at the Web.com Tour's Mexico Championship in May.

2012: Finished outside the qualifying spots with a T64 finish at the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica Q-School at Doral's White Course in August… Missed the cut in all three of his PGA TOUR Latinoamérica starts… Missed the cut at the Mexico Open on his first career start on the Web.com Tour.
tourBios.personal: Speaks Spanish, English and French… Biggest thrill in golf was making a hole-in-one at the par-four No. 2 at Vallescondido in Mexico… Desert Forest in Arizona and El Jaguar in Merida, Mexico are his favorite golf courses… Big fan of Real Madrid and Miami Heat… Has a Real Madrid headcover for his 5-wood… Tiger Woods, Arnold Palmer and Seve Ballesteros would round out his dream foursome… Bucket list includes skydiving and traveling thru Asia… Personal motto: “The value of something depends on the way you deal with it mentally and not with the thing itself.”… Twitter and Instagram name is @jdfedz

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri was T11th in 2014 at the Lexus Panama Classic.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T75th in Par Breakers on the Latinoamérica.
